title.rendered: Bénédicte, Major Accounts works director at Sogea-Satom

content.rendered:
Involved in African development

Bénédicte da Silva works on projects in Cotonou, Benin. A graduate of the Ponts et Chaussées engineering school in Paris, she was assigned to a major project in Benin, which she manages autonomously. She currently heads three projects in the region.

excerpt.rendered: Bénédicte da Silva works on projects in Cotonou, Benin
